title: Ticket #6200: STORE_CRED username check should be case-insensitive on windows
description:
In #5984 (released in version 8.5.8), we added a restriction that users can only store credentials for their own account. This check is done on both unix and windows, and is case-sensitive. Windows usernames are explicitly case-insensitive, so the check should be changed to reflect that.

We've received a report on htcondor-users from someone having trouble because of this.
remarks:
